Huly Issue: HVSYN-2

title: Fix issue title sanitization for beads sync

comments.author: node
comments.text:
Some Huly issue titles contain special characters (×, long titles >100 chars) that cause bd create commands to fail.

Solution: Add title sanitization in BeadsService.js before calling bd create:

- Limit title length to 100 chars
- Replace special chars with ASCII equivalents
- Escape quotes and newlines
